# Alalluna


## Intro

Alalluna app allows you to teach and learn arts comfortably from your home, it also serves as a complement to a traditional arts academy. Interact, share, enjoy and learn art with us


data:image/jpeg;base64,

## Functional Description

Alalluna  app is a responsive application for studying arts, where teachers can track and correct their students' works of art and students can share their works and learn basic concepts of drawing, painting, composition and other concepts. It also includes a group chat to ask questions and you can share the necessary links to the theoretical documentation and links of interest. and of course, a materials section so that students have within reach all the necessary tools for each exercise.

https://scontent-mad2-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.30808-1/291052234_427264846080199_8364342088552506659_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_p200x200&_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=5f2048&_nc_ohc=J0Wa7I5EkkUQ7kNvgF8zP1s&_nc_ht=scontent-mad2-1.xx&oh=00_AfD3pxj0lc8wVgZL7qGpMhatvovTRJtOUFNf6iSKZLeDPA&oe=663A94DA

### Use Cases

#### for teacher

- Teach your students to draw and paint, with a lot of graphic techniques and disciplines with the help of this app
- Share lessons and docuemntation of arts
- Look and correct the work of your students
- Offer other skills for the execution of your works in different formats(pdf, prezi, video)
- Offer link of all tools that you need to do exercises

#### for students
- Learn to draw and paint with different disciplines from the comfort of your home
- Learn different graphic techniques to carry out your works
- Share your works of art
- Learn with our virtual classes
- Acquire the necessary tools with a single click 
- Ask your teacher or classmates whatever you want
- Get a graphic summary of everything you learned in your profile

## Technical Description

### Technologies

- JavaScript
- React
- Node
- Express
- Mongo

## Modules

- API (server)
- App (client)

### Data Model

User
- id (string, required)
- name (string, required)
- email (string, required)
- username (string, required)
- password (string, required)

Image
- id (string, required)
- tittle (string, required)
- image (string, required)
- text (string, required)

Blackboard
- pen
- form
- blackboard
- text
- rubber

Chat
- id (string, required)
- user (User.id)
- message( string, required)
- date (date, required)
- status (string, required, enum: open|closed)

Tools
- id (string, required)
- exerciseNumber (string,required)
- tittle ( string, required)
- link ( string, required)
- description (string, required)

Serch
- Label
- Input
- Button
